Class SimulationController

java.lang.Object
org.derekn.p2pSim.SimulationController
public class SimulationController extends Object
Controls the overall simulation of the P2P file-sharing network. Manages peer creation, chunk transfers, and simulation ticks.

      public SimulationController(int initialPeers, int totalChunks)
      Constructs a SimulationController and initializes peers.
      Parameters:
      initialPeers - Number of peers to start with
      totalChunks - Total number of file chunks in simulation
